text:
At the next PV shoot, we'll also be taking some
promotional images in the studio.

We need a few for publicity purposes, so I'm thinking
of shooting some outside the studio as well.

You can have some freedom in choosing the shooting
locations, so if you have any preferences, let me know.

Um, is it really okay for me
to express my preferences?

Yeah, I'd be happy to hear Mano's
own opinion. Don't hesitate.

We can allocate a bit of budget for it too.
So... a theme park would be fine.

Wow... a theme park... It sounds like it could turn
out to be something like a prince from a fairy tale...

Haha, indeed. Given Mano's costume concept this time,
you're the "prince", after all.

What do you think? If you really want to go with a theme
park, we can. But if you have other ideas, let me know.

Um, yes, well...
um... If it's possible, then...
